text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/NksBC7dY3d 

On Thursday 18 February 2021, 12,057 new cases and 454 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

A total of 16,423,082 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine. https://t.co/RChK7XXpKd
